posts.post_title: SOLD: nice T206 portrait, Hal Chase (pink background)...
posts.post_content:
Please see the attached scans.  I would gladly work out trades for any T209/T210/T211 that I am looking for.   The Bowen is actually for sale too.  Priced separately:

Chase $SOLD postpaid
Spade $SOLD postpaid

Please send me a PM if interested.  Thank you.  :)
